instructions: put the dinner plate at bottom.
put the dinner fork at left side close to the plate.
put salad fork at left side closed from dinner fork.
put blade at right side close to the plate.
put salad knife closed from dinner knife from his right side.
Put soop spoon at right side, close from salad knife.
Put Water Glass at top right of plate.
put Wine glass close from water one, at its right side.
Put another wine glass at right side from previous close to it.
Put coffee cup at bottom right corner.
put bread plate at top left place from dinner one
put butter knife into butter plate, on right part, vertically.
put dessert fork on top from dinner plate horizontally pointed to right side, close to plate.
put dessert spoon  parallel to dessert fork but pointing to left side.
put napkin into dinner plate, vertically, at center point.<br><br>
